text: @mhdksafa Yes, always. Until there's a vaccine.  There's data on neurological damage from #COVID19, strokes & worse. Plus the tiny, sticky, blood clots that can block circulation, sometimes leading to amputation. No way to tell whether you'll be asymptomatic if you get it, or d.i.e.
